posts.post_content:
David Hunk
[url]davehunk107@gmail.com[/url]

Have proof if wanted.
Agree.  He tried it with me too.  Used the oft cited immortal words, "How much will you pay?"

Is this person on Net54? I see both of you are in NC as am I. Is he contacting you through the site or another way? Would love a heads-up.

Thanks!!!
Gary

[quote name="111gecko" post=2279940]Is this person on Net54? I see both of you are in NC as am I. Is he contacting you through the site or another way? Would love a heads-up.

Thanks!!!
Gary[/QUOTE]

I think he snuck in but got caught fairly quickly and banned. Now he just emails people from when he was here, I guess. If any of these scammers PM, then I need to know about it so they can be booted. 
.

Tried it on me too...I played along long enough to get his info: (maybe a different scammer?)

Name: Victor Prado

Address: 554 W Greendale St Covina, CA 91723
He came thru on my email on file with net54

[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=2279972]He came thru on my email on file with net54[/QUOTE]

Exactly. It wasn't a PM. He can still email whomever he has an email for.  He can't PM. 
As has been asked, get their net54 id and check it. That will stop most of them right there. They won't give you one as they are banned and it shows under their id. And again, be careful of them giving you a good id but not be that person. 
.

sounds very much like this guy: 

David Wood [url]david.wood2970@gmail.com[/url]

Same thing, emailed me out of the blue in response to my "buying orval overall items" n54 posts - "how much will you pay?" "what do you want to pay?" and when i didn't respond for a couple hours he'd re-send the emails. at first he had a couple 100$ cards he was offering that were worth about that. then randomly he had a 30k card that he wanted to sell me lol. after i asked his N54 username he said he just got my name off google and never emailed me again. this was all about two weeks ago now.
I received one from him also.  Big bag of dicks out there.

Got an email from him as well, never responded. 


[quote name="iwantitiwinit" post=2280054]I received one from him also.  Big bag of dicks out there.[/QUOTE]

[quote name="Leon" post=2279987]Exactly. It wasn't a PM. He can still email whomever he has an email for.  He can't PM. 
As has been asked, get their net54 id and check it. That will stop most of them right there. They won't give you one as they are banned and it shows under their id. And again, be careful of them giving you a good id but not be that person. 
.[/QUOTE]

i have got 3 different email in the last 10 days this my response
"show me a picture of you holding your drivers licence and the card next to your face ,
a thieving scammer would never ever do that ? are you a thieving scammer"

on each occasion crickets..........

[quote name="megalimey" post=2280162]i have got 3 different email in the last 10 days this my response
"show me a picture of you holding your drivers licence and the card next to your face ,
a thieving scammer would never ever do that ? are you a thieving scammer"

on each occasion crickets..........[/QUOTE]

Pretty sure I wouldn't give a relative stranger a picture of my driver's license.

Than again, I also wouldn't randomly email somebody and offer to sell them baseball cards.
